title: Bug 108822 - More efficient disk sorting logic needed for border row values
OB: The existing disk sorting logic does not handle border row values efficiently.
EB: A more efficient logic should be implemented to process disk sorting when there are border values for row data. The new logic should sort the data directly in memory and then write it to the file.
SR: To reproduce the issue: 1. Copy the file to the destination folder. 2. Observe the sorting behavior for rows with border values. 3. Verify that the existing sorting logic is not efficient for handling border row values.
